parts.text: Do you believe, Do you believe, Do you believe
Oh yes I believe in the Father and the Son And the Holy Spirit, Yes I believe (DC)
Do you believe yes I believe

text: Mighty Father I believe (Ref.) Who created heaven and earth (Ref.) I believe in Jesus Christ (Ref.) Everlasting Son of God (Ref.& chorus)
Equal in the Father's power (Ref) And through Him all things were made (Ref.) He it was who saved us all (Ref.) And from heaven He came to earth (Ref.& chorus)
Of the Virgin Mary born (Ref.) By the Spirit was made flesh (Ref.) Suffered death was crucified (Ref.) And He rose up from the dead (Ref.& chorus)
He ascended into heaven (Ref.) And His kingdom has no end (Ref.) In the Spirit I believe (Ref.) Lord and Vivifier of all (Ref.& chorus)
With the Father and the Son (Ref.) He's adored and glorified (Ref.) I believe in the Holy Church (Ref.) And one baptism professed (Ref.& chorus)
I shall see him there in heaven (Ref.) Living in the world to come (Ref.) Amen amen amen. Amen amen amen. (Ref.& chorus)
